ygData.subject: RE: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: And they humor you by pretending to listen. ;) they cannot get away, because you run faster than them. From: Ryan Honeyman  ... You
ygData.messageBody:
And they humor you by pretending to listen. ;) they cannot get away, because
you run faster than them.


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> Getting the exp back is not the problem. The problem is that
> most people divide the game into "quality" playtime (fighting
> mobs, exploring, etc), and "wasted" playtime (traveling,
> running back to your corpse, waiting for mana/hp to
> regenerate).

You forgot my favorite time slice, and that's chatting up the women.
I put aside an hour or two each day to sing to all the girls, and
tell the tales of Harmonic who single handedly defeated Cazic Thule,
how he slashed Maestro with his 6-note blade, how he can solo the Lord
Room with his helmet visor down.

Now that's quality time.

Harmonic.
